nodes.label: MCP Introduction
nodes.description: Understand what Microsoft Certified Professional (MCP) is and its significance in the industry.

nodes.label: Benefits of MCP
nodes.description: Explore the career advantages and professional recognition gained from achieving MCP certifications.

nodes.label: Certification Paths Overview
nodes.description: Learn about the different Microsoft certification tracks available, such as Azure, Microsoft 365, and Dynamics 365.

nodes.label: Choosing Your Certification Path
nodes.description: Select a certification path that aligns with your career goals, current skills, and interests.

nodes.label: Understanding Exam Objectives
nodes.description: Analyze the skills measured and topics covered in specific Microsoft certification exams to guide your study.

nodes.label: Study Resources & Tools
nodes.description: Discover official Microsoft learning paths, documentation, online courses, and other valuable study materials.

nodes.label: Practice Exams & Labs
nodes.description: Utilize practice tests and hands-on labs to solidify knowledge and become familiar with the exam environment.

nodes.label: Exam Day Strategies
nodes.description: Develop effective strategies for managing time, understanding question formats, and performing optimally during the actual exam.

nodes.label: Certification Maintenance
nodes.description: Learn how to renew your certifications and stay current with evolving Microsoft technologies and industry standards.

nodes.label: Intro to MCP Servers
nodes.description: Understand what a Minecraft PC (MCP) server is and its basic purpose.

nodes.label: Java Runtime Preparation
nodes.description: Learn to install and configure the correct Java Runtime Environment for your server.

nodes.label: EULA Agreement
nodes.description: Understand and accept the Minecraft End User License Agreement before running a server.

nodes.label: Basic Server Setup
nodes.description: Download the server JAR and run it for the first time on your operating system.

nodes.label: Server Properties Configuration
nodes.description: Configure core server settings using the server.properties file.

nodes.label: Console Commands
nodes.description: Learn essential commands to manage players, game modes, and server behavior directly from the console.

nodes.label: Plugin and Mod Basics
nodes.description: Understand the difference between plugins and mods and how to install basic server-side enhancements.

nodes.label: Firewall and Port Forwarding
nodes.description: Configure your network to allow external players to connect to your server securely.

nodes.label: Whitelist and Permissions
nodes.description: Implement player access control using whitelists and set up basic permissions.

nodes.label: Backup and Restore Strategies
nodes.description: Develop methods for regular server backups and understand how to restore your world.

nodes.label: Performance Optimization
nodes.description: Apply advanced settings and techniques to improve server lag and stability.
